SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app

Class GameTimer

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.Timer
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.GameTimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameTimer extends Timer
GameTimer --- Holds information about the timer that causes the game to tick. Has methods for specific events to cause a delay before going forward with the event.

    • runEvent

      public void runEvent(Runnable event, int delay)
      Code to run when the player meets an event.
      Parameters:
      event - A runnable that will trigger the effects of the event.
      delay - Delay before the event is triggered in ms.
